Package gameproject

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Ball
    The ball class creates a circle shape which is a fixture with a red image overlaying it The class also adds sounds when the ball is destroyed
    BallH
    The ballh class creates a circle shape which is a fixture with a purple image overlaying it The class also adds sounds when the ball is destroyed
    Bomb
    The bomb class creates a circle shape which is a fixture with a image of a bomb overlaying it The class also adds sounds when the ball is destroyed
    BombHit
    bombhit class is a collision that when it hits the cup the player looses 5 points as well as if they are over the score limit it will force them to the next level
    Controller
    The controller class allows you to move the player to release the balls The class also looks at what level you are on for the return possession of the player
    ControlPanel
    The control panel class creates a GUI The class also has a label which shows the score
    Cup
    The cup class makes a fixture in the shape of a "U" The class also counts how many balls have hit it
    GameLevel
    game level is a abstract class which makes every class that extends it has to have certain override methords
    GameProject
    game project class makes the frame so you can see the game, starts the game and changes level
    Level1
    Level1 extends GameLevel to make sure that it overrides everything it needs to such as the player start
    Level2
    Level2 extends GameLevel to make sure that it overrides everything it needs to such as the cup position
    Level3
    Level3 extends GameLevel to make sure that it overrides everything it needs to such as the score limit
    Level4
    Level4 extends GameLevel to make sure that it overrides everything it needs to such as the getCup to return the score
    MagicBall
    The magicball class creates a circle shape which is a fixture with a image overlaying it The class also adds sounds when the ball is destroyed
    MagicHit
    magic hit class is a collision that when it hits the cup the player gains 5 points then the ball is destroyed
    MyView
    my view changes the background depending on what level you are on.
    Pickup
    pickup class is a collision that when it hits the cup the player gains 1 point but when it hits you get the ball back to use again.
    Stopper
    The Stopper class is the player, the class just makes a boxshape that is big enough to stop the balls
    WallHit
    wall hit class is a collision that when it hits the wall the ball is destroyed
    Walls
    The walls class makes a fixture in the shape of a "U" The class is to clean up the balls that didnt hit the cup to help with performance as well as to activate the sounds effects.
